data.name: Dark Reign
data.tooltip:
Blasts target area with dark energy, hitting enemies at random and dealing <d ref="duckiesHeroDragonDarkBeam_Damage.amount" style="Bold"/> damage per hit.

Total of 48 strikes over 3 seconds. Same enemy cannot be hit more than <d ref="duckiesHeroDragonDarkBeam_StartPersistent.periodic.count"/> times. Doesn't target structures.
